name: Scolipede
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), this Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.
